src_text: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.
ref_text: A-o lunesdì, a Sara Danius, segretäia permanente da Commiscion Nobel pe-a Lettiatua de l'Academia de Sveçia, a l'à annonçiou pubricamente int'un programma radio de l'aradio svedeise in Sveçia che a commiscion, comme a no poeiva arrivâ direttamente a-o Bob Dylan in ponto vittöia do Premmio Nobel pe-a lettiatua 2016, a l'aiva abbandonou i seu sfòrsci pe seghittâlo.
hyp_text: Into 2016, Sara Danius, a segretria do Comitæ Nobel pe Literatua do-a Scuola Académica de-a Svezia, a l'à annunçiou pe radio into programma de Sveriges Radio into Svezia che o Comitæ Nobel o l'à abbandonou i sò tentativi de contattâ Bob Dylan, doppo che no l'à stæto possibillo de contattâlo pe faxin-lo conscie de l'èito do Nobel pe Literatua.

src_text: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.
ref_text: Sto chì o no confirma sôo che a-o manco quarche dinosouro o l'aiva e ciumme, unna teoria de za diffusa, ma o fornisce di dettaggi che i fòscili pe commun no peuan, comme o cô e a forma à træ dimenscioin.
hyp_text: No soltanto ch'o confirma che almen de di dinosaui a ghe n'era che co' penne, unn'ipotesi che a l'é d'jà largamente spartegnua, ma o provêde detaielli che i fossili de solito no se poian dî, tæi comme o coô e a tridimesionâllitæ.

src_text: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.
ref_text: Apreuvo che e ciumme de dinosouro no gh'aveivan un cäçiggion ben sviluppou, stæto ciammou un rachis, ma gh'aveivan de atre meñe de ciumme – barbi e barbule – i reçercatoî ne deduan che o rachis o l'ea probabilmente un sviluppo de l'evoluçion ciù tardio che ste atre meñe.
hyp_text: Inta-o momento, i dinoxî a n'àn ben sviluppou unna struttua che a se chama rachide, ma a n'àn ànche dòte altre carateristiche de pælle, - i barbi e i barbê - e sti a l'é ben ben stæto infærto che a l'é unna sviluppaçion evolutiva ciù tarda, ch'a l'é stæta ciù sviluppou dòppo.

src_text: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.
ref_text: A struttua de ciumme a fa accapî che no vegnivan deuviæ into xeuo, ma ciutòsto pe regolâ a tempiatua ò pe figua. I reçercatoî an propòsto che, sciben sta chì a l'é a coa d'un dinosouro zoeno, l'exempio o mostre e ciumme d'un grande e no i scatiggioin d'un pollin.
hyp_text: A struttua di l'penni a suggéize che no se gh'ero usou in sciô volo, ma pe regolâ a temperatûa o per mostrâ a sénsa. I ricercatoî a suggéize che, seben che a ça a l'é de 'n giovæn dinosauro, o campion a mostra l'penni de l'adulto e no o plumagge de 'n pollo.

src_text: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

hyp_text: No danni maggionâ o ferite son stæti ripoçti inte a Tongo, ma o potente l'é stæto momentaneamente perduo, ch'o l'à rappòrto che i autoritæ de Tongo no son stæti in grando de ricevî o avixin de tsunami emissou da-o PTWC.

[Ligurian]: À tutti i mòddi, tutti i belgi e i svisseri de lengua françeise an impreiso o françeise standard a-a scheua, e no avian di problemi à capîve ascì ben che deuviæ o scistema de numeraçion franseise standard.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Ligurian]: Into corso di secoli e gente gh’an edificou con cua de fasce in sciô paisaggio aspio e rapido, fin a-e scuggee che s’avansan in sciô mâ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Ligurian]: 800 miggia do Trans-Alaska Pipeline System ean stæte serræ, apreuvo à unna perdia de miggiæa de barrî de petròlio grezzo, à sudde de Fairbanks, inte l'Alaska.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Ligurian]: De zöne che in giornâ forman parte do Belgio in tempo favan parte do Lussemburgo, ma son diventæ belghe apreuvo a-a rivoluçion belga di anni ’30 de l’Euttoçento.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Ligurian]: Fin da-o seu comenso, The Onion a l'é vegnua à ëse un vertadeo impëio da parodia do giornaliximo, con unn'ediçion à stampa, un scito web ch'o l'à attiou 5.000.000 vixitatoî sôo che into meise d'ötovie, personali ads, un network de notiçie à 24 oe, podcasts, e un atlante do mondo, stæto allansou che no l'é guæi, stæto ciammou Our Dumb World.

src_text: Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground," said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona.
ref_text: “O seu comportamento termico o no l'é coscì contunnio comme e grende barme in sciâ Tæra, che de spesso mantëgnan unna tempiatua doçemente constante, ma o l'é conscistente con sti pertuxi fondi into seu,” o l'à dito o Glen Cushing da squaddra astrogiològica do United States Geological Survey (USGS) e da Northern Arizona University scituâ à Flagstaff, Arizona.
hyp_text: O comportamento termico no l'é nincan de stabel come a-o cavæ che in sce l'ægoa, che l'apreua a-o tempô, ma o l'é costante co-a probabilitæ che sti sian de forxe in sce l'ægoa, "dize Glen Cushing do team de geologgia do USGS e do Northern Arizona University, a-o Flagstaff, in Arizona.

src_text: In France, voting has traditionally been a low-tech experience: voters isolate themselves in a booth, put a pre-printed sheet of paper indicating their candidate of choice into an envelope.
ref_text: In Fransa, votâ a l'é pe tradiçion unn'espeiensa à bassa tecnologia: i elettoî se isoan int'unna gabiña, mettan int'unna busta un feuggio de papê pre-stampou ch'o l'indica o candidou ch'an çernuo.
hyp_text: Into Francia, o voto o l'é stæto tradiçionâmente un'esperiença a tecnołoxî bassæ: i votanti se isoan in un bocchìn, meten into un scarpon de carta prinstoua che indighi o candido che gh'han scioûo in un fæsto.

src_text: Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent so that voters and observers can witness that no envelopes are present at the start of the vote and that no envelopes are added except those of the duly counted and authorized voters.
ref_text: Da-o 1988, e urne devan ëse trasnaparenti, tanto che i votanti e i osservatoî pòssan testemoniâ che a-o comenso do voto no gh'é de buste drento e che no vëgne azzonto de buste, feua che quelle di votanti debitamente contæ e autorizzæ.
hyp_text: D'ancheu 1988, i scatole de votaçion a van devegnî trasparenti, perché i votatoî e i observatoî poian vê che no gh'é inisciâ nincun fasciello, e che no gh'é nincun fasciello che no l'é stæto conteu e autorizou.

src_text: Perry stated that he would "return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary.

hyp_text: Perry o l'à stæto de dî che o l'arivâ a-o Texas pe-a valutaçion de l'esito de ste notte de caucio, e pe-o determinâ se o gh'ha 'na strada pe-o sô corsa, ma po' o l'à stæto de dî che o l'arivâ a-a corsa e che o competi into primmo de l'Agosto inte l'Arxentìna.

[Ligurian]: À tutti i mòddi, tutti i belgi e i svisseri de lengua françeise an impreiso o françeise standard a-a scheua, e no avian di problemi à capîve ascì ben che deuviæ o scistema de numeraçion franseise standard.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Ligurian]: Into corso di secoli e gente gh’an edificou con cua de fasce in sciô paisaggio aspio e rapido, fin a-e scuggee che s’avansan in sciô mâ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Ligurian]: 800 miggia do Trans-Alaska Pipeline System ean stæte serræ, apreuvo à unna perdia de miggiæa de barrî de petròlio grezzo, à sudde de Fairbanks, inte l'Alaska.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Ligurian]: De zöne che in giornâ forman parte do Belgio in tempo favan parte do Lussemburgo, ma son diventæ belghe apreuvo a-a rivoluçion belga di anni ’30 de l’Euttoçento.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Ligurian]: Fin da-o seu comenso, The Onion a l'é vegnua à ëse un vertadeo impëio da parodia do giornaliximo, con unn'ediçion à stampa, un scito web ch'o l'à attiou 5.000.000 vixitatoî sôo che into meise d'ötovie, personali ads, un network de notiçie à 24 oe, podcasts, e un atlante do mondo, stæto allansou che no l'é guæi, stæto ciammou Our Dumb World.

hyp_text: Ean cancellou o tour apreuvo che o Steven Tyler, cantante de capo, o l'é stæto ferîo apreuvo che o l'é caddiuu da-o palcâ mentre o l'é stæto in sciâ scena into 5 d'agosto.
prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Ligurian]: À tutti i mòddi, tutti i belgi e i svisseri de lengua françeise an impreiso o françeise standard a-a scheua, e no avian di problemi à capîve ascì ben che deuviæ o scistema de numeraçion franseise standard.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Ligurian]: Into corso di secoli e gente gh’an edificou con cua de fasce in sciô paisaggio aspio e rapido, fin a-e scuggee che s’avansan in sciô mâ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Ligurian]: 800 miggia do Trans-Alaska Pipeline System ean stæte serræ, apreuvo à unna perdia de miggiæa de barrî de petròlio grezzo, à sudde de Fairbanks, inte l'Alaska.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Ligurian]: De zöne che in giornâ forman parte do Belgio in tempo favan parte do Lussemburgo, ma son diventæ belghe apreuvo a-a rivoluçion belga di anni ’30 de l’Euttoçento.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Ligurian]: Fin da-o seu comenso, The Onion a l'é vegnua à ëse un vertadeo impëio da parodia do giornaliximo, con unn'ediçion à stampa, un scito web ch'o l'à attiou 5.000.000 vixitatoî sôo che into meise d'ötovie, personali ads, un network de notiçie à 24 oe, podcasts, e un atlante do mondo, stæto allansou che no l'é guæi, stæto ciammou Our Dumb World.

src_text: 108 plates of Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different edible items, like, sweets, fruits, nuts, dishes etc. which are offered to deity) were served to Baba Shyam.

src_text: The bill requires violent video games sold in the state of California to be labeled with a decal reading "18" and makes their sale to a minor punishable by a fine of $1000 per offense.
ref_text: O decretto o prevedde che i video zeughi violenti, stæti vendui into stato da California, seggian segnalæ da un adexivo co-a scrita “18” e o rende a seu vendia à un minô da punî con unna murta de $1000 pe ògni trasgrescion.

src_text: Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.
ref_text: I reçercatoî de l'Universcitæ de Princeton inti Stati Unii e de l'Universcitæ de Uppsala inta Sveçia an referio che a neuva specie a s'é evolua inte sole doe geneaçioin, mæximo se se creddeiva che pe sto proçesso ghe voesse ben ben ciù de tempo, in caxon da reproduçion tra un frenguello de Darwin endemico, Geospiza fortes, e o frenguello cactus immigrou, Geospiza conirostris.
hyp_text: I ricercatö da-a Princeton University into Stati Unïi e da-a Uppsala University inte a Suecia a l'han raporou che a nove speçie a l'é evoluou in doi generaçioin, ma che sti pröcessi a l'han stæto credû che o l'avesse ciappou ben de longo, graçio a-a crozâ de-a Geospiza fortes, 'na finch endemica, e da-a Geospiza conirostris, 'na finch immigrante.

src_text: There were also toilets in ancient Egypt, Persia and China. In Roman civilization, toilets were sometimes part of public bath houses where men and women were together in mixed company.

src_text: Congress lacked any power to impose taxes, and, because there was no national executive or judiciary, it relied on state authorities, who were often uncooperative, to enforce all its acts.

hyp_text: O Congresso no gh'àva de poteri pe impienâ i tassæ, e, comme gh'ea n'executivo e un giudice nascionâ, gh'andava de rîghe a-i autoritæ do Stæto, che a l'éran spesse uncooperativi, pe eseguîe tutte e sò le legge.

src_text: The Articles required unanimous consent from all the states before they could be amended and states took the central government so lightly that their representatives were often absent.

src_text: In 1895, after defeat in the First Sino-Japanese War (1894-1895), the Qing government signs the Treaty of Shimonoseki, by which it cedes sovereignty over Taiwan to Japan, which rules the island until 1945.

[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Ligurian]: Into corso di secoli e gente gh’an edificou con cua de fasce in sciô paisaggio aspio e rapido, fin a-e scuggee che s’avansan in sciô mâ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Ligurian]: 800 miggia do Trans-Alaska Pipeline System ean stæte serræ, apreuvo à unna perdia de miggiæa de barrî de petròlio grezzo, à sudde de Fairbanks, inte l'Alaska.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.

[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.

[Ligurian]: À tutti i mòddi, tutti i belgi e i svisseri de lengua françeise an impreiso o françeise standard a-a scheua, e no avian di problemi à capîve ascì ben che deuviæ o scistema de numeraçion franseise standard.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Ligurian]: Into corso di secoli e gente gh’an edificou con cua de fasce in sciô paisaggio aspio e rapido, fin a-e scuggee che s’avansan in sciô mâ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Ligurian]: 800 miggia do Trans-Alaska Pipeline System ean stæte serræ, apreuvo à unna perdia de miggiæa de barrî de petròlio grezzo, à sudde de Fairbanks, inte l'Alaska.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Ligurian]: De zöne che in giornâ forman parte do Belgio in tempo favan parte do Lussemburgo, ma son diventæ belghe apreuvo a-a rivoluçion belga di anni ’30 de l’Euttoçento.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Ligurian]: Fin da-o seu comenso, The Onion a l'é vegnua à ëse un vertadeo impëio da parodia do giornaliximo, con unn'ediçion à stampa, un scito web ch'o l'à attiou 5.000.000 vixitatoî sôo che into meise d'ötovie, personali ads, un network de notiçie à 24 oe, podcasts, e un atlante do mondo, stæto allansou che no l'é guæi, stæto ciammou Our Dumb World.

src_text: Also between each dynasty was an unstable age of divided provinces. The best-known of these periods was the Three Kingdoms epoch taking place for 60 years between the Han and the Jin Dynasty.

hyp_text: E tra ogni dinastia gh'é stæto un'epoca instabilissima de provinçe divizæ. A conosciua de ste periode gh'é stæta quell'epoca de i Tre Regni, che gh'é stæta in sciô passo de 60 anni fra a dinastia Han e a dinastia Jin.

src_text: Technological determinism is a term that encompasses a wide range of ideas in practice, from technology-push or the technological imperative to a strict sense that human destiny is driven by an underlying logic associated with scientific laws and their manifestation in technology.
ref_text: O determiniximo tecnològico o l'é un termine chi comprende inta prattica unna gran fia de idee, da-o sponcion-tecnològico ò imperativo tecnològico in senso streito, che o destin di òmmi o l'é guiddou da unna lògica sotterrania associâ a-e lezze scientifiche e a-a seu manifestaçion in tecnologia.
hyp_text: O tecnologiximo determinista o l'é unn'etimologia ch'a comprende de variæ iddei in pratica, da-o tecnologiximo push o l'imperativo tecnologiximo a-o sensi stricto ch'o destin de l'omo o l'é determinou da-o logego incoeu associou a-e leggi scìentiffiche e a-e manifestaçioin tecnologgege.

src_text: Most interpretations of technological determinism share two general ideas: that the development of technology itself follows a path largely beyond cultural or political influence, and that technology in turn has "effects" on societies that are inherent, rather than socially conditioned.
ref_text: E ciù tante interpretaçioin do determinismo tecnològico condividdan doe idee generali: che o sviluppo da tecnologia o va apreuvo à un seu percorso a-o de là de l'influensa colturale e politica, e che a tecnologia de gio a gh'à di “effetti” in scê societæ che son inerenti, ciutòsto che socialmente condiçionæ.
hyp_text: Tant'interpretaçioin de determinismo tecnologico condividin dôe idee generâle: che o sviluppo de tecnologia a l'é un cammino che peu che o l'é de l'è indipendente da influença culturâle e poliitica, e che a tecnologia a l'é stæta "a goa" in sciô societæ che l'é inerente, e no sociai condizionou.

src_text: Subsistence agriculture is a simple, often organic, system using saved seed native to the ecoregion combined with crop rotation or other relatively simple techniques to maximize yield.
ref_text: L’agricoltua de suscistensa a l’è un scistema semplice, de spesso biològico, ch’a l’addeuvia di semmi recuperæ originäi de l’ecoregion, combinæ co-a rotaçion de coltue ò atre tecniche relativamente semplici, pe mascimizzâ a reisa.
hyp_text: L'agricoltura de subsistensa e l'é un sistema simplo, spesso organico, che l'usa o seminâ scioâ nasciù inte l'eco-regio con-a rotazione de produtti o con-a sciâ de tecniche a-o maximizâ o prodotto.

src_text: One of the most common methods used to illustrate the importance of socialization is to draw upon the few unfortunate cases of children who were, through neglect, misfortune, or wilful abuse, not socialized by adults while they were growing up.
ref_text: Un di metodi ciù communi deuviæ pe inlustrâ l’importansa da socializzaçion o l’è piggiâ sponto da-i pöchi casi desdicciæ de figgeu che, pe negligensa, sfortuña ò abuso volontäio, no son stæti socializzæ da-i adulti inta fase da crescita.
hyp_text: Oun de e sœi metodi ciù comuni usæ pe illustrâ l'importansa de l'asocializaçion, o l'é de apprœuviâ i pochi cazô infortunæ de bêni ch'o gh'àn avuo, grâse a-o neglegio, a-o malocorso, o abuso volontâio, no vegnî asocializæ da-i adulti mentre che o vegnivan su.
prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Ligurian]: À tutti i mòddi, tutti i belgi e i svisseri de lengua françeise an impreiso o françeise standard a-a scheua, e no avian di problemi à capîve ascì ben che deuviæ o scistema de numeraçion franseise standard.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Ligurian]: Into corso di secoli e gente gh’an edificou con cua de fasce in sciô paisaggio aspio e rapido, fin a-e scuggee che s’avansan in sciô mâ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Ligurian]: 800 miggia do Trans-Alaska Pipeline System ean stæte serræ, apreuvo à unna perdia de miggiæa de barrî de petròlio grezzo, à sudde de Fairbanks, inte l'Alaska.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Ligurian]: De zöne che in giornâ forman parte do Belgio in tempo favan parte do Lussemburgo, ma son diventæ belghe apreuvo a-a rivoluçion belga di anni ’30 de l’Euttoçento.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Ligurian]: Fin da-o seu comenso, The Onion a l'é vegnua à ëse un vertadeo impëio da parodia do giornaliximo, con unn'ediçion à stampa, un scito web ch'o l'à attiou 5.000.000 vixitatoî sôo che into meise d'ötovie, personali ads, un network de notiçie à 24 oe, podcasts, e un atlante do mondo, stæto allansou che no l'é guæi, stæto ciammou Our Dumb World.
Translate the following sentence from English to Ligurian
[English]: One of the most common methods used to illustrate the importance of socialization is to draw upon the few unfortunate cases of children who were, through neglect, misfortune, or wilful abuse, not socialized by adults while they were growing up.
[Ligurian]:

src_text: Such children are called "feral" or wild. Some feral children have been confined by people (usually their own parents); in some cases this child abandonment was due to the parents' rejection of a child's severe intellectual or physical impairment.
ref_text: Sti figgeu son ciammæ “bestiali” ò “sarvæghi”. Çerti figgeu sarvæghi son stæti confinæ da-e persoñe (pe sòlito i seu genitoî); inte çerti caxi st’abbandon do figgeu o l’ea dovuo a-o refuo da parte di genitoî de unna grave menomaçion intellettuale ò fixica do figgeu.
hyp_text: I figiotti son chiammi "feral" o "sbracati". De sbracati gh'é stæto chi son stæti confinnæ da-o pöeple (in generâ da-i propri pæddi); inte di atri casi, a confinamento a l'é stæto dovuo a-o rifiuto di-i pæddi de un figgio gravemente mentâle o fisicamente imbarià.

src_text: When completely brought up by non-human animals, the feral child exhibits behaviors (within physical limits) almost entirely like those of the particular care-animal, such as its fear of or indifference to humans.
ref_text: Quande vëgne allevou completamente da di animæ no umen, o figgeu sarvægo o mostra di comportamenti (drento di limiti fixichi) squæxi pægi areo à quelli da particolâ bestia ch’a se piggiâ cua de lê, comme a seu poia ò indifferensa pe-i umen.
hyp_text: Quande o l'é stæto cresciuo da-o animal no-uman, o figiô de l'animæl færò a manifestaçion de comportaménti (inti limiti fìscæi) pròpio scignificativamente da-o particolâ animal de cure, tanti com o sòo de pâ e de indifferença verso l'uman.

src_text: While project based learning should make learning easier and more interesting, scaffolding goes a step beyond.
ref_text: Tanto che l’imprendimento basou in sce di progetti o dovieiva rende ciù façile imprende, e ciù interessante, o scaffolding o va un passo ciù avanti.
hyp_text: Mentre o apprendimento basou in sciâ progettaçion a l'é 'n strumento ch'o pœu fâ l'apprendimento ciù fæchi e ciù interesante, o scaffolding o va in sciâ segonda.

src_text: Scaffolding is not a method of learning but rather an aid that provides support to individuals whom are undergoing a new learning experience such as using a new computer program or beginning a new project.
ref_text: O scaffonlding o no l’è un metodo de imprendimento, ma ciutòsto un aggiutto ch’o fornisce un arrembo a-e persoñe che son apreuvo à affrontâ unna neuva esperiensa de imprendimento, comme l’utilizzo de un neuvo programma de computer, ò l’iniçio de un neuvo progetto.
hyp_text: O scaffoldo no l'é un metodo de apprendimento ma un aiuto ch'o no fornisse sostegno a-a persona che a l'é in procinto de apprendi un nove programma de computatoî, ou de comensâ un nove progetto.

src_text: Scaffolds can be both virtual and real, in other words, a teacher is a form of scaffold but so is the little paperclip man in Microsoft Office.
ref_text: I scaffold peuan ëse segge virtuali segge reali, in atre paròlle, un insegnante o l’è unna forma de scaffold, ma ô l’è ascì l’ommetto de graffette de Microsoft Office.
hyp_text: I scaffaldi pœuan êse ambe virtuali e reali, in altre parole, un'insegnante e' un formo de scaffaldo ma o l'é ascì o picinìn papero de Microsoft Office.

src_text: Virtual Scaffolds are internalized in the software and are meant to question, prompt, and explain procedures that may have been to challenging for the student to handle alone.
ref_text: I scaffold virtuali son interiorizzæ into software e an a finalitæ de de mette in discuscion, suggerî, spiegâ de procedue che porrieivan ëse diffiçili da gestî pe-o studente da solo.
hyp_text: Virtual Scaffolds ean impreiso inte o software e ean pensæ pe giudî, stimolâ e spiegâ i procedimenti ch'o l'é stæto troppo difiçile a-o studente de far da solo.

hyp_text: In principio a Buddismo do Tibet o l'é ben simplice. O consiste de Yoga Kundalini, meditaçion e o cammin de l'amô che o l'incorpa toante.

src_text: The center of Tibetan meditation is the Deity Yoga. Through the visualization of various deities the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras are activated and the enlightenment consciousness is created.

hyp_text: O zenito do meditâ de tibetan o l'é o Deity Yoga. Pei a vizuaçion de vari deitæ, i canæ do enerxî o l'éan netti, i chakras o l'éan ativæ e a conscia de illuminâ a l'é creâ.

src_text: However, these plans were rendered obsolete nearly overnight, when over 800,000 soldiers from the Soviet's Union Red Army entered and created the Belarussian and Ukrainian fronts after invading the eastern regions of Poland in violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other international treaties, both bilateral and multilateral.
ref_text: Con tutto, sti cien son stæti reixi obsoleti squæxi da un giorno à l’atro, quande ciù de 800.000 sordatti de l’Armâ Rossa e de l’Union Sovietica intran e crean i fronti bieloruscio e ucrain, dòppo avei invaso e regioin orientali da Polònia in violaçion do trattou de paxe de Riga, e atri trattæ internaçionali, segge bilaterali che multilaterali.
hyp_text: Ma i piani ean stæti stornæ pròpio a-o stempo, quandi ciu de 800.000 soldæ da Armâ Rossa do Soviet Union ean intræ e, creando i fronti bielorussi e ucraini, ean invasæ le regioni orientæ do Polonia in violaçion do Tratâto de Riga, do Pàgto de Non-Aggresscion Soviet-Polaco, e de altri tratâti internaçionâi, bilaterâi e multilaterâi.

src_text: After its adoption by Congress on July 4, a handwritten draft signed by the President of Congress John Hancock and the Secretary Charles Thomson was then sent a few blocks away to the printing shop of John Dunlap.

[Ligurian]: À tutti i mòddi, tutti i belgi e i svisseri de lengua françeise an impreiso o françeise standard a-a scheua, e no avian di problemi à capîve ascì ben che deuviæ o scistema de numeraçion franseise standard.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Ligurian]: Into corso di secoli e gente gh’an edificou con cua de fasce in sciô paisaggio aspio e rapido, fin a-e scuggee che s’avansan in sciô mâ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Ligurian]: 800 miggia do Trans-Alaska Pipeline System ean stæte serræ, apreuvo à unna perdia de miggiæa de barrî de petròlio grezzo, à sudde de Fairbanks, inte l'Alaska.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Ligurian]: De zöne che in giornâ forman parte do Belgio in tempo favan parte do Lussemburgo, ma son diventæ belghe apreuvo a-a rivoluçion belga di anni ’30 de l’Euttoçento.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Ligurian]: Fin da-o seu comenso, The Onion a l'é vegnua à ëse un vertadeo impëio da parodia do giornaliximo, con unn'ediçion à stampa, un scito web ch'o l'à attiou 5.000.000 vixitatoî sôo che into meise d'ötovie, personali ads, un network de notiçie à 24 oe, podcasts, e un atlante do mondo, stæto allansou che no l'é guæi, stæto ciammou Our Dumb World.

[English]: In developed countries you seldom hear similar levels of complaints about water quality or bridges falling down.
[Ligurian]:

src_text: Why do transportation systems engender such complaints, why do they fail on a daily basis? Are transportation engineers just incompetent? Or is something more fundamental going on?
ref_text: Perché i scistemi de transpòrto generan de sti mogogni, perché falliscian tutti i giorni? I inzegnê di transpòrti son solo incompetenti? Ò l’è apreuvo à succede quarcösa de ciù fondamentale?
hyp_text: Pâi de cossa ch'o dêve trâsto a-a dîta che i sistemi de trasporto engénian tant'arvæi, e trægo a fallimento ogni dì? Se i ingegni de traspòrto son incompæti? O gh'è de sôto un-a fondamentâ cossa che se stagne?

src_text: Traffic Flow is the study of the movement of individual drivers and vehicles between two points and the interactions they make with one another.

hyp_text: O flusso do trafego o l'é o studio do movimento di scianti e de veicoli tra deuviæ e l'interaçion ch'o l'àn co-o scinco.

src_text: Fortunately, drivers tend to behave within a reasonably consistent range; thus, traffic streams tend to have some reasonable consistency and can be roughly represented mathematically.
ref_text: Pe fortuña i conduttoî tendan à avei di comportamenti à l’interno de un range raxonevolmente coerente; donca i flussi de traffego tendan à avei unna conscistensa raxoneive e peuan ëse gròsso mòddo rappresentæ matematicamente.
hyp_text: A fortuna, i conduttoî a l'égoen a comportâse in-a rangia aminca e consitente; coscì, i correnti de traffico tendan a avéi de-a consitense aminca e pögan êse representæ matematicamente.

src_text: In 2002 Goma was destroyed by lava from the Nyiragongo volcano which buried most of the town’s streets, particularly the town centre.

src_text: The forests aren't just mangrove swamps though — they include some of the last remaining stands of the mighty jungles which once covered the Gangetic plain.
ref_text: Con tutto, e foreste no son solo palude de mangrövie: includdan çerti tra i urtimi soprasseu restæ de jungle gaggiarde che un tempo crovivan a cianua do Gange.
hyp_text: A-i foresti no se són mai limitæ a-e palude de mangrovie — son stæti ciù a l'interno de-i ultimi restanti gruppi de-i magnifiche giungli che a-i copivan a pianura do Gange.

src_text: Since 1966 the Sundarbans have been a wildlife sanctuary, and it is estimated that there are now 400 Royal Bengal tigers and about 30,000 spotted deer in the area.

hyp_text: Dapei che l'Asunción a l'é stæta fondâ into 1537, o Paraguay a l'à avouo a-o longo do ténpo de mantegnî un bel pâ de sò carateri e identitæ indigena.

src_text: The official Falklands currency is the Falkland pound (FKP) whose value is set equivalent to that of one British pound (GBP).
ref_text: A valua offiçiâ de Falkland a l’è a sterliña de Falkland (FKP) o valô da quæ o l’è impostou pægio à quello da sterliña britannica.
hyp_text: A moèna ofiçiâ de l'arcipelago das Falkland a l'é o Falkland pound (FKP) ch'o gh'à o sò valore estætu o mesmo de quelli de l' sterlina britannica (GBP).

hyp_text: Apia e l'é a capitâ de Samoa. A çitæ a l'é into ësulo de Upolu e a gh'à unna popolaçion de sôlo 39.000 abitanti.

src_text: Due to the underwater topology the return flow is concentrated at a few deeper sections, and a fast current to deep water may form there.
ref_text: Pe caxon da topologia subacquea, o flusso de ritorno o l’è concentrou inte çerte seçioin ciù prefonde e lì porrieiva formâse unna corrente veloce verso de ægue prefonde.
hyp_text: Grazie a-a topologia sotamariña, o ritorno de corrente a l'é concentrâ in pochi sectoî ciù fondi, e 'na corrente ciù rápida versciu a-a profondità a l'é ciù probabile che in quelli.
prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Ligurian]: À tutti i mòddi, tutti i belgi e i svisseri de lengua françeise an impreiso o françeise standard a-a scheua, e no avian di problemi à capîve ascì ben che deuviæ o scistema de numeraçion franseise standard.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Ligurian]: Into corso di secoli e gente gh’an edificou con cua de fasce in sciô paisaggio aspio e rapido, fin a-e scuggee che s’avansan in sciô mâ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Ligurian]: 800 miggia do Trans-Alaska Pipeline System ean stæte serræ, apreuvo à unna perdia de miggiæa de barrî de petròlio grezzo, à sudde de Fairbanks, inte l'Alaska.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Ligurian]: De zöne che in giornâ forman parte do Belgio in tempo favan parte do Lussemburgo, ma son diventæ belghe apreuvo a-a rivoluçion belga di anni ’30 de l’Euttoçento.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Ligurian]: Fin da-o seu comenso, The Onion a l'é vegnua à ëse un vertadeo impëio da parodia do giornaliximo, con unn'ediçion à stampa, un scito web ch'o l'à attiou 5.000.000 vixitatoî sôo che into meise d'ötovie, personali ads, un network de notiçie à 24 oe, podcasts, e un atlante do mondo, stæto allansou che no l'é guæi, stæto ciammou Our Dumb World.

src_text: Most deaths happen as result of fatigue trying to swim back against the current, which may be impossible.
ref_text: A ciù parte di decesci a se verifica pe caxon da fadiga into tentativo de nuâ contracorrente, cösa che a porrieiva ëse imposcibile.
hyp_text: A mòrti a gh'à ciù probabilitæ de succédde comme conseguensa de l'efòrti a-o tentativo de nâgo contr'a-o scîto, ch'o pöe ben no essi possibilmente.

src_text: Try aiming somewhere where you are not caught again or, depending on your skills and on whether you have been noticed, you might want to wait for rescue.
ref_text: Preuva à miâ da quarche parte donde no ti vëgni catturou torna ò, à segonda de teu abilitæ, e se t’ê nottou, ti porriësci voei aspëtâ i soccorsci.
hyp_text: Càrco de dîte a-o pûo, prové a-a mirâ a-o pûo, in sciâ parti dove no se 'n cati pròpio, o, se ti sei notou e se o ti é a-o pûo, a s'arrestâ finche no vêgne scampou.

src_text: When you went abroad at first, people were probably patient and understanding, knowing that travellers in a new country need to adapt.
ref_text: Quande ti væ à l’estranxeo, pe-i primmi tempi, con tutta probabilitæ, e gente en paçiente e comprenscive, perché ô san che chi va à vive inte un paise foresto o l’à beseugno d’adattâseghe.
hyp_text: Quande te sei portou o primmo vòtto fœu ostri, a gente a l'é probabile che a l'à stæto paciente e intelescente, saviando che i viaggiatoî inte 'n paize novo o ne van a l'adattâ.
prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Ligurian]: À tutti i mòddi, tutti i belgi e i svisseri de lengua françeise an impreiso o françeise standard a-a scheua, e no avian di problemi à capîve ascì ben che deuviæ o scistema de numeraçion franseise standard.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Ligurian]: Into corso di secoli e gente gh’an edificou con cua de fasce in sciô paisaggio aspio e rapido, fin a-e scuggee che s’avansan in sciô mâ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Ligurian]: 800 miggia do Trans-Alaska Pipeline System ean stæte serræ, apreuvo à unna perdia de miggiæa de barrî de petròlio grezzo, à sudde de Fairbanks, inte l'Alaska.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Ligurian]: De zöne che in giornâ forman parte do Belgio in tempo favan parte do Lussemburgo, ma son diventæ belghe apreuvo a-a rivoluçion belga di anni ’30 de l’Euttoçento.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Ligurian]: Fin da-o seu comenso, The Onion a l'é vegnua à ëse un vertadeo impëio da parodia do giornaliximo, con unn'ediçion à stampa, un scito web ch'o l'à attiou 5.000.000 vixitatoî sôo che into meise d'ötovie, personali ads, un network de notiçie à 24 oe, podcasts, e un atlante do mondo, stæto allansou che no l'é guæi, stæto ciammou Our Dumb World.
Translate the following sentence from English to Ligurian
[English]: When you went abroad at first, people were probably patient and understanding, knowing that travellers in a new country need to adapt.
[Ligurian]:

src_text: Majorcan cuisine, like that of similar zones in the Mediterranean, is based on bread, vegetables and meat (specially pork), and uses olive oil throughout.
ref_text: A coxiña maiorchiña, comme quelle de atre aree pæge do Mediterraneo, a se basa in sciô pan, in scê verdue e in sciâ carne (mascime de pòrco), e a deuvia ben ben l’euio d’öia.
hyp_text: A cuina de Maiorca, comme quella de zöne similæ inte o Mâ Mediteranêo, a l'é basâ in sciô pan, in sciô vegeto e in sciô carne (spesciâmente o porco), e a l'usa o olio de oliva inta tùtta.

[Ligurian]: À tutti i mòddi, tutti i belgi e i svisseri de lengua françeise an impreiso o françeise standard a-a scheua, e no avian di problemi à capîve ascì ben che deuviæ o scistema de numeraçion franseise standard.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Ligurian]: Into corso di secoli e gente gh’an edificou con cua de fasce in sciô paisaggio aspio e rapido, fin a-e scuggee che s’avansan in sciô mâ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Ligurian]: 800 miggia do Trans-Alaska Pipeline System ean stæte serræ, apreuvo à unna perdia de miggiæa de barrî de petròlio grezzo, à sudde de Fairbanks, inte l'Alaska.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Ligurian]: De zöne che in giornâ forman parte do Belgio in tempo favan parte do Lussemburgo, ma son diventæ belghe apreuvo a-a rivoluçion belga di anni ’30 de l’Euttoçento.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Ligurian]: Fin da-o seu comenso, The Onion a l'é vegnua à ëse un vertadeo impëio da parodia do giornaliximo, con unn'ediçion à stampa, un scito web ch'o l'à attiou 5.000.000 vixitatoî sôo che into meise d'ötovie, personali ads, un network de notiçie à 24 oe, podcasts, e un atlante do mondo, stæto allansou che no l'é guæi, stæto ciammou Our Dumb World.
